abstractText: A Nepalese paper manuscript containig a Buddhist Collection of Stotras and Songs (Āryāvalokiteśvarastotra by Carpatipāda 1v-3r4, (Āryāvalokiteśvara)karuṇāstavastotra by Bhandudatta 3r4-5r6, (Āryāvalokiteśvara)rūpastava 5r6-6v6, (Āryāvalokiteśvara)narakoddharastotra 6v6-7v1, Āryāvalokiteśvara)caraṇadarśanābhilāṣastotra 7v1-8v1, Ṣaṭabhijñastavastotra 8v2-9v1, (Āryāvalokiteśvara)potalakāṣṭakastotra 9v1-10r2, (Āryāvalokiteśvara)avadhānastotra 10r3-10v7a, (Āryāvalokiteśvara)dvādaśamāsihalānuśaṃsāstotra 11r1-11v7, Sugātāvadānoddhṛtasaptabuddhastotra 12r1-13r3, Prajñāpāramitāstuti 13r3-13r7, (Buddha)suprabhātastotra 13v1-15r5, Śākyasiṃhastotra 15r6-16r2, Śākyasiṃhastotra by Yaśodharā 16r3-17r1, (Bhadrakalpāvadānoddhṛta)śākyasiṃhastotra by Navagraha 17r2-17v5, (Śākyasiṃha)maṅgalaṣoḍaśaka 17v5-18v3, (Svayaṃbhūpurāṇoddhṛta)mañjuvrajastotra by Mañjugarta 19v2-20r7, (Āryāvalokiteśvara)saptavidhānuttarapūjāstotra 20r7-21v4, (Āryāvalokiteśvara)muktimālāstavastotra 21v4-22v2, (Āryāvalokiteśvara)ratnamālāstavastotra 22v2-24v1, (Āryāvalokiteśvara)maṇimālāstāvastotra 24v1-25v2, (Āryāvalokiteśvara)rakṣakāstavastotra 25v2-26v4, (Śākyamunibuddha)śākyamunistavastotra 26v4-27r7, Āryāvalokiteśvarabhaṭṭārakastavastotra 27v1-28r2, (Āryāvalokiteśvarabhaṭṭāraka)cintarājastava by Jayamuni 28r2-28v6, Mahābodhivandanāṣṭaka 28v6-29r7, (Śākyamuni)buddhadharmasaṅghastotra 29r7-30r4, (Āryāvalokiteśvara)ajñāmahābhayaharaṇahṛdayamālāstava 30r4-31r2, Āryāvalokiteśvarāstakastotra 31r2-31v3, Ślokāṣṭakastotra 31v3-32r7, Dvādaśacaityagīta 32v1-33r3, Dharmadhātubuddhagīta 32v4-34r6, Buddhagīta 34r6-34v4, Lokeśvaragīta 35r1-36v7).
abstractShort: A Nepalese paper manuscript containig a Buddhist Collection of Stotras and Songs (Āryāvalokiteśvarastotra by Carpatipāda
title: Collection of Stotras and Songs
